name: Less is Mower
description:
With your lawn mower in hand, experience the thrill of cutting grass at breakneck speeds. 

Less Is Mower is a top-down simulation game developed for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam.  As a professional lawnmower, it is your job to clear levels by cutting tufts of grass all while skillfully maneuvering past obstacles. Drive over grass in fields and fenced off enclosures with the lawnmower to keep the lawn healthy, neat, and trimmed. Steer away from rocks, trees, and other barriers that will slow you down and block your path. 

The win condition has not been fully implemented, so currently the gameplay loop is a sandbox.

Controls
  • WASD / Left Stick - Move Player
  • Escape - Hold to return to menu

Roles
  • Alejandro: Music, Sound
  • Bill: Art, Animation, Programming
  • Bryan: Production, Programming Lead
  • Wesley: Programming, Design
